title: Oregon extends crab fishing restrictions to protect whales from getting caught in trap ropes
description: Oregon has extended rules restricting the number of crab traps in the water.

title: Biggest search for Loch Ness Monster in over 50 years looks for volunteers
description: The Loch Ness Centre say it is running the largest search in over 50 years for its famous monster and it needs volunteers.

title: Toll from landslide in Georgia mountain resort up to 17 dead, 18 missing
description: A landslide hit a resort area in the mountains of the country of Georgia.

title: Niger's junta not backing down, regional force to intervene. Here’s what to expect
description: Tensions have escalated as deadline nears for possible military intervention.

title: Kansas bar where gunfire wounded 9 last month closes permanently
description: There was negative publicity and police blamed the bar for the shooting.

title: Flash flood warnings continue for parts of Missouri, Illinois
description: Flash flood warnings continue Saturday for parts of Missouri and Illinois, as severe weather is forecast across parts of the U.S. over the next three days.

title: Pennsylvania man bitten on the head by bear during attack in his garage
description: A Pennsylvania man says he’s paying a lot more attention to his surroundings.

title: Mexico finds 491 migrants being held at vacant lot, almost all are from Guatemala
description: All but six of the migrants were from Guatemala; the others are Hondurans.

title: A fugitive mob suspect betrayed by his passion for hometown Naples soccer champions
description: Passion for this year's soccer champions from Naples has led Italian police to capture a longtime organized crime fugitive who was living on a Greek island

title: Ukrainian drones hit a Russian tanker near Crimea in the second sea attack in a day
description: Ukrainian drones have hit a Russian tanker in the Black Sea near Crimea, according to Russian officials

title: 'Monster hunters' wanted in new search for the mythical Loch Ness beast
description: The Loch Ness Centre in Scotland is calling for “budding monster hunters” and volunteers to join in what it dubs the largest search for the Loch Ness Monster since the 1970s

title: Special counsel alerts court to Trump’s social media post
description: The special counsel told the court it was worried former President Donald Trump may target witnesses in the Jan. 6 case.

title: WATCH:  Dog on the loose brings traffic to standstill
description: A dog dodged traffic and brought cars to a standstill on Interstate 95 in Philadelphia. Police caught up after a one-mile chase and later returned the dog to its owner.

title: Norwegian climber retires after becoming the fastest to climb world's highest 14 peaks in 92 days
description: A Norwegian who has just become the fastest climber to scale all the world’s 14 highest mountains announced she was retiring from climbing high peaks upon her return to Nepal

title: Pakistani police arrest former Prime Minister Imran Khan
description: Pakistani police on Saturday arrested former Prime Minister Khan at his home in the eastern city of Lahore

title: Dems are overperforming in special elections. Is it a clue for Biden vs. Trump?
description: An analysis from FiveThirtyEight found that in 38 special elections held so far this year, Democrats have outperformed the partisan lean by an average of 10%

title: Spain routs Switzerland 5-1 to advance to the quarterfinals of the Women's World Cup
description: Aitana Bonmati has scored twice as Spain routed Switzerland 5-1 to advance to the quarterfinals of the Women’s World Cup for the first time

title: 2 officers injured in shooting in Orlando, police say
description: Two police officers were critically injured on Friday in Orlando, Florida, after stopping a vehicle allegedly connected to a Miami homicide, police said.

title: Landslides kill 3 at base camp of a Hindu temple in northern India and 17 others are still missing
description: Torrential rains have triggered a landslide at a base camp of a revered Hindu temple in the north Indian state of Uttarakhand, killing three people

title: FAA sets up new process for Hawaii air tour operators to fly at lower altitudes after fatal crashes
description: The Federal Aviation Administration says it's setting up a new process for air tour operators in Hawaii to be approved for flight at lower altitudes after numerous fatal crashes in recent years

title: A funeral home in El Salvador offers pink coffins with Barbie linings
description: A funeral home in El Salvador has taken Barbie mania to an extreme, offering pink coffins with Barbie linings

title: Slain Parkland victim's father speaks out following reenactment
description: Manny Oliver, who lost his son Joaquin to the 2018 mass shooting, spoke with ABC News Live.

title: Judge partially blocks Texas abortion ban for medical emergencies, fatal diagnoses
description: A Texas judge granted an injunction on Texas' multiple abortion bans as it related to medical emergencies and fatal fetal diagnoses.

title: 30 kids sent to hospital after Idaho school bus crash: Police
description: A school bus crashed on a highway in Idaho on Friday, authorities said.

title: Influencer to be charged after chaos erupts in New York City's Union Square
description: A promise of free PlayStations appears to have led to a chaotic scene of unrest in New York City's Union Square, police sources said.

title: The first pill to treat postpartum depression has been approved by US health officials
description: Federal health officials have approved the first pill to specifically treat depression after childbirth

title: Remote volcano in Alaska spews new ash cloud, prompting aviation warnings
description: A remote volcano in Alaska’s Aleutian Islands that has been active in recent weeks has spewed an ash cloud up to 30,000 feet into the sky

title: Compensation for New Mexico wildfire victims tops $14 million and is climbing
description: Federal emergency managers say they’re making more progress in compensating victims of a devastating wildfire sparked last year by the U.S. Forest Service
